SCTX:
Begin balynScript

float timer
short doOnce

if ( GetJournalIndex "DA_Mephala" < 40 )
	Return
endif

if ( GetJournalIndex DA_Mephala >= 60 )
	Return
endif

Set timer to ( timer + GetSecondsPassed )

if ( timer < 5 )
	Return
endif

Set timer to 0

if ( doOnce == 0 )
	if ( GetDistance Player <= 1024 )
		if ( player->GetDistance "hlaalu_loaddoor_ 02_balyn" <=256 )
			if ( GetLOS Player == 1 )
				ForceGreeting
				Journal DA_Mephala 55
				set doOnce to -1
			endif
		endif
	endif
endif

End
